GSD.product_version: versions from v5.0 to before v5.15.75
GSD.description:
memory: pl353-smc: Fix refcount leak bug in pl353_smc_probe()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.75 by commit 566b143aa5112a0c2784e20603778518bb799537, it was introduced in version v5.0 by commit fee10bd2267868f2a3e7ba008ef7665aac5e4412. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: memory: pl353-smc: Fix refcount leak bug in pl353_smc_probe()
